title: MF'S Blog
description: I am Juan Pablo and this is my blog where I post about technology, art, languages, and more!

home.title: I'm Juan Pablo 👋
home.description:
I'm a front-end developer with five years of experience working with technologies like React, Typescript, Redux, and some others, lately I have also been dabbling in the game development world with Unity. 🧑‍💻

I hope that you learn something new from my posts, if you want to know more about me, click one of these links down below.
